class.name: EditorResourcePreview
class.brief_description: Helper to generate previews of resources or files.
class.description: This object is used to generate previews for resources of files. [b]Note:[/b] This class shouldn't be instantiated directly. Instead, access the singleton using [method EditorInterface.get_resource_previewer].

method.name: add_preview_generator
method.description: Create an own, custom preview generator.

method.name: check_for_invalidation
method.description: Check if the resource changed, if so, it will be invalidated and the corresponding signal emitted.

signal.name: preview_invalidated
signal.description: Emitted if a preview was invalidated (changed). [code]path[/code] corresponds to the path of the preview.
